# chirimoya-cell



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                            | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `selected` | `selected` | boolean that indicates Status selected | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot          | Description                                     |
| ------------- | ----------------------------------------------- |
| `"leading"`   | Use for add a element before Title              |
| `"subTitle"`  | Use for add subTitle down title                 |
| `"switch"`    | Use for add input checkbox with shape of switch |
| `"thumbnail"` | Use for add leading Thumbnail before Title      |
| `"title"`     | Use for add Title                               |
| `"trailing"`  | Use for add a element at the end of the cell    |
